original_title: Tracey Ullman in the Trailer Tales
overview: Comedy special spotlighting Tracey Ullman’s larger than life character Ruby Romaine from HBO's “Tracey Takes On”.  After an illustrious career, veteran Hollywood makeup artist Ruby has decided to call it quits.  Or has she?  In her makeup trailer, Ruby tells a series of hilarious tales and explains why she reconsidered her retirement.  With Debbie Reynolds, Jane Kaczmarek.
title: Tracey Ullman in the Trailer Tales
